verses.name: Leviticus 19:26
verses.text: Ye shall not eat any thing with the blood: neither shall ye use enchantment, nor observe times.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:27
verses.text: Ye shall not round the corners of your heads, neither shalt thou mar the corners of thy beard.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:28
verses.text: Ye shall not make any cuttings in your flesh for the dead, nor print any marks upon you: I am the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:29
verses.text: Do not prostitute thy daughter, to cause her to be a whore; lest the land fall to whoredom, and the land become full of wickedness.

verses.name: Leviticus 19:30
verses.text: Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the Lord.
